Utils (pysar.utils)¶

Functions¶

SAR-specific tools (pysar.utils.sartools)¶

inc2range(inc[, h, rho_0, Re, xlook, ...]) Computes range bin for a given incidence angle
range2inc(...) Computes incidence angle for a given range bin
alpha_hh(eps, theta[, units]) HH Bragg scattering coefficient for an untilted plane
alpha_vv(eps,theta,units=) VV Bragg scattering coefficient for an untilted plane

General tools (pysar.utils.gen_tools)¶

d2r(n) degrees to radians
r2d(n) radians to degrees
acosd(n) t [degrees] = arccos(n)
asind(n) t [degrees] = arcsin(n)
cosd(n [degrees])
sind(n [degrees])
iscomplex(n) Tests for complexity...returns np.iscomplex(n)
anycomplex(n) Tests for any complexity
allcomplex(n) Tests for all complexity
typecomplex(n) tests for any type complex

Geographic tools (pysar.utils.geo_tools)¶

radius_lat(latitude[, a, b]) Calculate the radius of a planet at a given latitude

Scripts¶

None
